Title: Only Darkness
Description: Long have I waited for this day, hero. Are you and your allies prepared to bring the Lich King to justice? We charge on your command!
ObjectivesText: Defeat Remembered Lich King during a Radiant Echoes event.
PortraitGiverText: The forests of Lordaeron will always remember his name.
RewardText:
So, at last it is done.

May the people of Azeroth remember our deeds here forevermore. May the sacrifices of so many burn in their hearts eternally. May they never fail to risk mortal peril in the face of great evil.
